## Login `r fontawesome::fa(name = "right-to-bracket")` {.suso}

![](assets/login.mp4){fig-align="center"}

::: {.notes}

- Navigate to [Designer](https://designer.mysurvey.solutions/)
- Provide login and password

:::

## Search `r fontawesome::fa(name = "magnifying-glass")` {.suso}

![](assets/search.mp4){fig-align="center"}

::: {.notes}

- Choose a collection of questionnaires
  - Your: `MY QUESTIONNAIRES`
  - Shared with you: `QUESTIONNAIRES SHARED WITH ME`
  - Public: `PUBLIC`
- Provide a search term
- Execute the search, either
  - Pressing `Enter` or
  - Clicking on `r fontawesome::fa(name = "magnifying-glass")`

:::

## Create `r fontawesome::fa(name = "folder-plus")` {.suso}

![](assets/create_qnr.mp4){fig-align="center"}

::: {.notes}

- Click on `CREATE NEW  `
- Provide questionnaire name and variable name

:::

## Develop `r fontawesome::fa(name = "laptop-code")` {.suso}

![](assets/develop.mp4){fig-align="center"}

::: {.notes}

- Add sections

## Test `r fontawesome::fa(name = "vial-circle-check")` {.suso}

![](assets/test.mp4){fig-align="center"}

::: {.notes}

- press `COMPILE`
- see error, hover over, click on link, remedy; press COMPILE again
- resolve error
- press `COMPILE` again
- press TEST
- change questionnaire
- upate web tester and see changes reflected

:::

## Share `r fontawesome::fa(name = "share-from-square")` {.suso}

![](assets/share.mp4){fig-align="center"}

::: {.notes}

- Click share button
- Provide email/user name
- Toggle permissions
- Send edit request

:::
